review: The Amazon ads states, "The Amazon Fire Stick, Works Everywhere, Everytime."THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISING, I'M IN SOUTH AMERICA AND NOTHING ON INSTANT VIDEO WORKS, AND I AM A PRIME CUSTOMER.
author: nthany

review: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!!For those who do not have a smart TV, this works wonderfully! First of all, the product was properly packaged and arrived the morning of the due date, which was great because I was leaving work early that day; therefore, I was able to take it home immediately. It only took me approximately 5 minutes to connect and load Netflix and HULU, and SHAZAAAAM!!! Plus, the Fire TV Stick makes it much easier to watch movies when at home on Amazon Prime than before. I purchased two, but will definitely purchase another.
author: Firemom94

review: Easy to setup!  Easy to use, and works exactly as expected and described.  It serves the purpose that I needed it for, and I've been using it daily since I received it.  I really only use it to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime.  I haven't tried playing any games, nor will I.  But the Fire stick is a great and inexpensive way to be able to watch Netflix and Prime on my TV instead of my iPad.
author: Khalidah Taylor

review: I love it it's great Chris fitzgerald
author: Chris Fitzgerald

review: I love it, I just wish I could of try amazon prime, It said free for one month but was not able to sign up for it. Still I'm considering buying another one as a gift for my son.
author: Maria Cisneros
